item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0550; 09:28AM; 807 N Bridewell St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OOzt5H; #HighlandPark; 35 LAFD Firefighters, joined by neighboring South Pasadena Firefighters in Automatic Aid, took just 21 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an exterior fire that extended into the first and second floors of a 2 story residential duplex (apartments over parking), preventing fire damage to neighboring structures. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E447 E55 RA47 RA844 T1 T12 + South Pasadena FD E81 BC9 in Automatic Aid; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0550; 09:07AM; 805 N Bridewell St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y0WwmQ; #HighlandPark; PRELIM: Outside fire extended into a 2 story residential duplex, threatening at least one neighboring structure. Units from neighboring South Pasadena Fire Department have responded in Automatic Aid.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E447 E55 RA47 RA844 T1 T12 + South Pasadena FD E81 BC9 in Automatic Aid ; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#0470; 08:25AM; 5600 W Imperial Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nkLfsF; #ElSegundo; LAFD Assisting the El Segundo Fire Department with a multi-patient traffic collision in their jurisdiction. Media Inquiries: El Segundo Police and Fire.; LAFD BC4 E264 E295 E51 E95 EM18 RA51 RA64 RA95 T64 T95 Assisting El Segundo FD in Automatic Aid; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Brush Fire - Oro Fire 06/27/2022 INC#1674

item.description: Update Brush Fire - Oro Fire; INC#1674; 12:10AM; 11250 N Big Tujunga Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3A0Unua; Sunland; Firefighters have now reached the fire on the ground. It is located in heavy brush. There are no winds. They are getting handlines in place but it will take time given the terrain. There are no structures threatened and no injuries reported. . Some LAFD resources are being released and a scaled down response will handle. No further incident updates are expected to be released; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BP74 E24 E274 E289 E298 E60 E7 E77 E89 E90 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 RA74 T74 T89 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#1674; 11:41PM; 11250 N Big Tujunga Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3A0Unua; Sunland; Fire is updated to less than 1/4 acre in an area difficult to access by ground. LAFD helicopters made water drops while firefighters work their way to reach it with handlines. All LA County Fire resources are being released and this will be handled by LAFD only. No additional resources are expected to be required. There are no structures threatened and no evacuations in place. There are no injuries reported.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BP74 E24 E274 E289 E298 E60 E7 E77 E89 E90 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 RA74 T74 T89 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1674; 10:55PM; 11250 N Big Tujunga Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3A0Unua; Sunland; Firefighters are on scene with approximately 1/2 to 1 acre of brush burning under light to no wind conditions. LA County Fire is also on scene.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BP74 E24 E274 E289 E298 E60 E7 E77 E89 E90 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 RA74 T74 T89 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Multi-Casualty Incident; INC#0957; 02:58PM; 2200 S Sawtelle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nn4dcA; Sawtelle; A traffic collision reported as three vehicles and pedestrians (exact number of pedestrians unknown at this time) with initial reports of six patients (ages are approximate): 3 "ALS" patients with a range of injuries - 79yo F patient sustained the most significant injuries and is transporting in critical condition, 23yo F and 20yo F also transporting with *at least* serious injuries. Three additional patients with non-life threatening injuries: 70yo M, 26yo F and 26yo M. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 2404. No further details.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E37 E5 EM9 RA37 RA43 RA62 RA834 RA867 RA894; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#1718; 10:15PM; 12323 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bsaJlj; North Hollywood; Amtrack train struck a pedestrian (circumstances unknown) and firefighters determined death of the patient on scene (age/gender unknown at this time). LAPD Inc# 4238 Sheriff Dept also responding. All further questions are referred to the appropriate law enforcement agency. Firefighters will assist with body recovery as required. The 9-1-1 call was received at 10:02PM. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E60 E81 EM17 HR3 RA81 RA86 RA889 RA89 T60 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1666; 09:40PM; 217 N Burlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3niq6zg; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews contained the fire to the 1st floor. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E20 E203 E211 E220 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1666; 09:28PM; 217 N Burlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3niq6zg; Westlake; Two story, single family dwelling with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E20 E203 E211 E220 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart
